summary: TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 2002 NEWMAR DUTCH STAR.  WHILE DRIVING 55 MPH, THE FRONT PASSENGER BRAKE CALIPERS FAILED TO RELEASE AND PULLED THE VEHICLE TO THE RIGHT.  THE CONTACT PULLED OFF THE ROAD FOR A FEW MINUTES AND THE BRAKE CALIPERS AUTOMATICALLY RELEASED.  HE NOTIFIED WORKHORSE AND THEY STATED THAT THE CALIPER PINS NEEDED TO BE LUBED ONCE A YEAR.  THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 36,713 AND CURRENT MILEAGE WAS 36,721.   UPDATED 03-06-09 *BF
